title: Schedule Management Web Application
sub: A calendar based TodoList Web that allows user to add, edit, and delete their personal schedules
features: Implemented Google social login using Google OAuth API
Utilized FullCalendar library for schdule-based UI
Migrated backend to Springboot and implemented RESTful APIs
Replaced Supabase Auth with server-side Google OAuth using Spring Security
desc: A web-based ToDo List for managing personal schedules with calendar

title: Personal Web Portfolio
sub: A portfolio website showcasing skills, projects, and career at a glance
desc: Built a scalable portfolio management website

title: AI-based Recipe Recommendation Service for Foreigners
sub: Recipe recommendation using Yolov7 and OCR-based ingredient and receipt analysis
features: Integrated Flask and Spring Boot servers for ingredient & receipt uploads
Developed favorites feature in My Page
desc: Global recipe recommendation service for foreigners using image and receipt analysis

title: Personalized Workout Recommendation Service
features: Designed and published full website UI
desc: Provides YouTube workouts, gyms, trainers, and custom routine calendars based on survey results

title: Kiosk UI/UX Improvement
sub: Enhanced kiosk usability for fast-food restaurants by shortening the ordering process
features: Collected real-world kiosk ordering video data
Created and tested prototype UI improvements
desc: Reduced digital divide in kiosk use by analyzing user data and improving UI for faster ordering
